00080 database::database (const char * home,      
00081                     bool         create)    
00082   : m_home(string(home)),
00083     m_env(NULL),
00084     m_seq(NULL)
00085 {
00086     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::database] ENTER");
00087     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::database] home = " << home);
00088     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::database] create = " << create);
00089 
00090     // database flags
00091     u_int32_t flags = DB_THREAD         // multi-threaded access
00092                     | DB_INIT_LOCK      // locking for concurrent applications
00093                     | DB_INIT_LOG       // recoverability
00094                     | DB_INIT_MPOOL     // in-memory cache
00095                     | DB_INIT_TXN;      // transaction subsystem
00096 
00097     if (create) flags |= DB_CREATE;
00098 
00099     // open/create the environment
00100     int res = db_env_create(&m_env, 0);
00101 
00102     if (res == 0) res = m_env->set_alloc(m_env, malloc, realloc, free);
00103     if (res == 0) res = m_env->open(m_env, m_home.c_str(), flags, 0);
00104 
00105     // create top-level transaction
00106     DB_TXN * txn = NULL;
00107     if (res == 0) res = m_env->txn_begin(m_env, NULL, &txn, DB_READ_COMMITTED | DB_TXN_SYNC);
00108     if (res == 0) m_txns.push(txn);
00109 
00110     // open/create the sequences database
00111     flags = DB_THREAD;
00112 
00113     if (create) flags |= DB_CREATE | DB_EXCL;
00114 
00115     if (res == 0) res = db_create(&m_seq, m_env, 0);
00116     if (res == 0) res = m_seq->open(m_seq, txn, "__seq.db", "__seq", DB_BTREE, flags, 0);
00117 
00118     // handle error, if any
00119     if (res != 0)
00120     {
00121         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::database] " << db_strerror(res));
00122 
00123         if (m_seq != NULL) m_seq->close(m_seq, 0);
00124         if (txn   != NULL) txn->abort(txn);
00125         if (m_env != NULL) m_env->close(m_env, 0);
00126 
00127         switch (res)
00128         {
00129             case ENOENT:    throw exception(BDB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND);
00130             case EEXIST:    throw exception(BDB_ERROR_EXISTS);
00131             default:        throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::database] EXIT");
00136 }
00137 
00142 database::~database () throw ()
00143 {
00144     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::~database] ENTER");
00145 
00146     // lock stack of active transactions
00147     interprocess_mutex mutex;
00148     scoped_lock <interprocess_mutex> lock(mutex);
00149 
00150     // rollback non-completed transactions (besides top-level one)
00151     while (m_txns.size() != 1)
00152     {
00153         DB_TXN * txn = m_txns.top();
00154         m_txns.pop();
00155         txn->abort(txn);
00156     }
00157 
00158     // close all associated sequences
00159     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_sequences.size(); i++)
00160     {
00161         delete m_sequences[i];
00162     }
00163 
00164     // close all associated tables
00165     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_tables.size(); i++)
00166     {
00167         delete m_tables[i];
00168     }
00169 
00170     DB_TXN * txn = m_txns.top();
00171 
00172     if (m_seq != NULL) m_seq->close(m_seq, 0);
00173     txn->commit(txn, DB_TXN_SYNC);
00174     if (m_env != NULL) m_env->close(m_env, 0);
00175 
00176     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::~database] EXIT");
00177 }

00191 sequence * database::add_sequence (const char * name,       
00192                                    bool         create)     
00193 {
00194     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::add_sequence] ENTER");
00195     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::add_sequence] name = " << name);
00196     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::add_sequence] create = " << create);
00197 
00198     sequence * s = NULL;
00199 
00200     try
00201     {
00202         s = new sequence(this, name, create);
00203         assert(s != NULL);
00204         m_sequences.push_back(s);
00205     }
00206     catch (...)
00207     {
00208         throw;
00209     }
00210 
00211     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::add_sequence] EXIT");
00212 
00213     return s;
00214 }

00224 table * database::add_table (const char       * name,       
00225                              compare_callback   fn_cmp,     
00226                              bool               create)     
00227 {
00228     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::add_table] ENTER");
00229     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::add_table] name = " << name);
00230     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::database::add_table] create = " << create);
00231 
00232     table * t = NULL;
00233 
00234     try
00235     {
00236         t = new table(this, name, fn_cmp, create);
00237         assert(t != NULL);
00238         m_tables.push_back(t);
00239     }
00240     catch (...)
00241     {
00242         throw;
00243     }
00244 
00245     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::add_table] EXIT");
00246 
00247     return t;
00248 }

00255 void database::begin_transaction ()
00256 {
00257     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::begin_transaction] ENTER");
00258 
00259     interprocess_mutex mutex;
00260     scoped_lock <interprocess_mutex> lock(mutex);
00261 
00262     DB_TXN * txn = NULL;
00263 
00264     int res = m_env->txn_begin(m_env, m_txns.top(), &txn, DB_READ_COMMITTED | DB_TXN_SYNC);
00265 
00266     if (res == 0)
00267     {
00268         m_txns.push(txn);
00269     }
00270     else
00271     {
00272         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::begin_transaction] " << db_strerror(res));
00273         if (txn != NULL) txn->abort(txn);
00274         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00275     }
00276 
00277     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::begin_transaction] EXIT");
00278 }
00279 
00286 void database::commit_transaction ()
00287 {
00288     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::commit_transaction] ENTER");
00289 
00290     interprocess_mutex mutex;
00291     scoped_lock <interprocess_mutex> lock(mutex);
00292 
00293     if (m_txns.size() == 1)
00294     {
00295         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::commit_transaction] the database has no active transactions");
00296         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND);
00297     }
00298 
00299     DB_TXN * txn = m_txns.top();
00300     m_txns.pop();
00301 
00302     int res = txn->commit(txn, DB_TXN_SYNC);
00303 
00304     if (res != 0)
00305     {
00306         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::commit_transaction] " << db_strerror(res));
00307         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00308     }
00309 
00310     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::commit_transaction] EXIT");
00311 }
00312 
00319 void database::rollback_transaction ()
00320 {
00321     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::rollback_transaction] ENTER");
00322 
00323     interprocess_mutex mutex;
00324     scoped_lock <interprocess_mutex> lock(mutex);
00325 
00326     if (m_txns.size() == 1)
00327     {
00328         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::rollback_transaction] the database has no active transactions");
00329         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND);
00330     }
00331 
00332     DB_TXN * txn = m_txns.top();
00333     m_txns.pop();
00334 
00335     int res = txn->abort(txn);
00336 
00337     if (res != 0)
00338     {
00339         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::database::rollback_transaction] " << db_strerror(res));
00340         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00341     }
00342 
00343     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::database::rollback_transaction] EXIT");
00344 }
